thread.title: Woman plays basketball with Globetrotters for 109th birthday

title: Woman plays basketball with Globetrotters for 109th birthday
text:
Woman plays basketball with Globetrotters for 109th birthday 4:17pm GMT - 01:07 
Virginia McLaurin, who danced with Obama at the White House when she turned 106, celebrates her upcoming 109th birthday with the Harlem Globetrotters. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Virginia McLaurin, who danced with Obama at the White House when she turned 106, celebrates her upcoming 109th birthday with the Harlem Globetrotters. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
